title: ESA astronaut with physical disability medically cleared for ISS missions
summary:
In a first, a European astronaut with a physical disability has been medically cleared for missions to the International Space Station.

title: Firefly’s Blue Ghost lander arrives in lunar orbit
summary: The robotic lander reached the Moon’s orbit after performing its 4 minute and 15 second Lunar Orbit Insertion burn, which began at 8:51 p.m. EST on Feb. 13 (0151 UTC on Feb. 14).

summary:

title: Blue Ghost 1 enters lunar orbit as Resilience flies by the moon
summary:
One commercial lunar lander has entered orbit around the moon while another, launched at the same time, made a lunar flyby to set up a later return.
The post Blue Ghost 1 enters lunar orbit as Resilience flies by the moon appeared first on SpaceNews.

title: U.S. Space Force awards Firefly $21.8 million contract for rapid-response launch mission
summary:

title: Eutelsat adapts GEO strategy as Starlink reshapes satellite connectivity
summary:
Eutelsat is taking another step away from consumer broadband as Starlink’s sprawling low Earth orbit network continues to erode demand for geostationary services.
The post Eutelsat adapts GEO strategy as Starlink reshapes satellite connectivity appeared first on SpaceNews.

title: Live coverage: SpaceX to launch 21 Starlink satellites on Falcon 9 rocket from Cape Canaveral
summary: The Starlink 12-8 mission will be SpaceX’s 20 orbital launch of the year and send 21 Starlink satellites to low Earth orbit. Liftoff is set for 1:14 a.m. EST (0614 UTC).
